to this

same with the DragonBone but instead of , change it to ; and you must cappitalize the “S” in Skill

item.title: Adding DragonBone ItemonItemHandler.java 667/728
item.dc:creator: @xplode xplode
item.description:
@xplode wrote:

OKAY so, i currently am adding dragonbone to the ItemOnItemHandler.java and it currently looks like this

//DRAGONBONE_PLATEBODY( 24352, 14479, 24360, skills SMITHING, 75, 10, skills CRAFTING, 75,10); and Ect. for everyone…

if i dont put the “//” i get 6 errors… but since i did put the // i get none and when i compile its safe… and when i go to use the kit on dragon it still says nothing interesting happens… has anybody added fully working dragonbone to there server? if soo please send me an updated ItemOnItemHandler.java file or just tell me what to fix thanks!
